biography: Discovering and spotlighting the next generation of India-focused beauty founders, innovators and creatives. Applications Open.  Created by @niv_elc

latestPosts.caption:
We’re proud to announce the launch of the fourth edition of BEAUTY&YOU India. Created by ELC’s New Incubation Ventures, the program propels and supports the next generation of entrepreneurs reimagining the future of beauty in India. 
 
We’re proud to return with lead partner @mynykaa and a new partnership with @StartupIndia.Gov.In. 
 
Winners will be recognized across four categories and receive $50-150K (41 lakhs -1.25 crores) to support their ideas, mentorship, retail support, and national visibility. 
 
Award categories: 
 
◾️ GROW – Best in-market beauty brands 
◾️ IMAGINE – Best pre-launch concepts 
◾️ BREAKTHROUGH – Best new innovations 
◾️ NEW: VISIONARY WOMEN’S AWARD – Jury prize recognizing the impact of outstanding women entrepreneurs 
 
Building the future of Indian beauty? This is your moment. 
Apply by August 24 at www.beautyandyouawards.com

The wait is finally over. 

Introducing to you; Luar’s Luminous Veil Liquid Foundation and Shade Shifters.

Crafted for Indian skin tones and climate, designed to last.

✨ What sets it apart?
Adapts, not masks – A formula that enhances your natural skin.
Science-backed innovation – Powered by our LASTING POLYMER NETWORK SYSTEM for seamless wear, all day long.
Sweat- & transfer-resistant – Made for the tropical climate of Indian weather, in Korea.

This is Luar. The beauty of innovation, the art of customization. A Beauty and You Finalist. 

Now live at luarbeauty.in

(beauty evolution, beyond beauty, innovation, luminous finish, customized beauty, sweat resistance, geo-specific formulation, foundation launch)

#IndianBeauty #BeyondBeauty #LuarBeauty #BeautyUnveiled #Innovation #ScienceBacked #GeoSpecific #WorldOfLuar

✨ Bringing Back Thick Indian Hair ✨
 
Meet Amright, a brand dedicated to helping women regain their lost confidence with effective hair growth solutions. Our award-winning formulae target hair fall and thinning at the root.
 
Honoured to have won the Beauty & You 2024 award @beautyandyouawards (backed by Estée Lauder and Nykaa) and get early recognition from industry leaders as we launch! 💫
 
We believe in taking the science-backed, inside out approach 🧬 and we’ve got three stellar products to help achieve that: Scalp & Hair Food Supplements, Hair Regrowth Serum & Root Stimulating Elixir. 
 
[Haircare, Hairfall, Nutrition, Healthy, Launch]

We’re beyond thrilled to share that we were crowned winners at the Beauty and You Awards!

A huge thank you to Estée Lauder and Nykaa for their incredible support. 

This achievement is a testament to the passion and an accelerator for our motivation.

#SohraiBeauty #MahuaMiracle #Launching2025 #BeautyInIndia #IndianSkincare #SkincareBrand #NaturalIngredients #BeautyAndYouAwards #EntrepreneurialJourney

The jury for this year’s BEAUTY&YOU India program included the biggest names across the global beauty, fashion, tech and finance ecosystems — we are so grateful to Shana Randhava, Anchit Nayar, Katrina Kaif, Rohan Vaziralli, Tarun Tahiliani, Anaita Shroff Adajania, Deepica Mutyala, Jaffrey Zaman, Shruti Chandra, Sujata Assomull, Samrath Bedi, Gianandrea Ferrari, Rochelle Pinto, Sumit Bhasin and Dr. Kiran Sethi for their time and support in making this program a success!

www.beautyandyouawards.com

@niv_elc @esteelaudercompanies @mynykaa 
#BEAUTYANDYOU #BEAUTYANDYOUIndia

After a rigorous application process and pitching their companies in front of our esteemed jury that included the biggest names in beauty, fashion, finance and tech, SkinInspired (@skininspired.in), Not Just Vanilla (@notjustvanilla.co), Amright (@amrightindia) and Journey of Objects (@journeyofobjects) took home the prizes for the GROW, IMAGINE and CREATE categories.

Congratulations to the winners, we are so proud of you and cannot wait to see you grow and flourish as you set the stage for a #SuperchargedFuture for the Indian beauty industry. 

@niv_elc @esteelaudercompanies @mynykaa
#BEAUTYANDYOU #BEAUTYANDYOUIndia #BEAUTYANDYOU2024

It was such a lovely evening meeting the best in beauty and celebrating the fresh entrepreneurial talent of India and around the world. Ever since its inception in 2022, the @beautyandyouawards by @esteelaudercompanies’ @niv_elc with lead partner @mynykaa has helped to discover, spotlight and propel India-focused founders and creators within the global beauty ecosystem. This year’s winners @journeyofobjects @notjustvanilla.co @amrightindia @skininspired.in are a shining example of how innovative and groundbreaking this new league of India-focused brands is — congratulations to all of them and I wish them the very best for a #SuperchargedFuture!
#ad

On October 17, 2024, @NIV_ELC presented the winners of the 2024 BEAUTY&YOU India program. The awards were presented at a finale event in New Delhi, attended guests including William P. Lauder, Executive Chairman, ELC;  @sdlf12 Stéphane de La Faverie, Executive Group President ELC; Rohan Vaziralli, General Manager, ELCA Cosmetics; @skr_44 Shana Randhava, SVP, NIV, ELC; Sumit Bhasin, SVP, Global Fragrance Innovation, Product Development & R&D, ELC; Falguni Nayar, Founder, Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer, NYKAA; and Shri Sanjiv Singh, Joint Secretary, Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade.
 
Chosen from over 660 finalists from both India and across the world, 12 inspiring founders presented their ideas for a #SuperchargedFuture of the Indian beauty industry across skin care, makeup, hair care, and fragrances. The final winners, chosen by a panel of esteemed judges across the beauty, fashion, tech, and finance ecosystems  will receive financial support, mentorship, resources, and exposure via @NIV_ELC, @myNykaa, and related partners. 
 
Congratulations to all the winners! @skininspired.in @notjustvanilla.co @amrightindia @journeyofobjects

Happy Diwali! We wish you an abundance of love, light and beauty for the festive season and beyond. 🪔✨🧡

@niv_elc
latestPosts.alt: Photo shared by BEAUTY&YOU on October 31, 2024 tagging @niv_elc.

latestPosts.caption:
I had such an inspiring evening with BEAUTY&YOU, at their special event to announce the winners for BEAUTY&YOU India 2024.

BEAUTY&YOU Awards is a very special program by The Estée Lauder Companies’ New Incubation Ventures, in partnership with NYKAA, and their mission is to discover, spotlight, and propel the next generation of India-focused beauty brands. 

The theme for 2024's program was Supercharged Futures, and the winners truly deserved their trophies. It's worth mentioning again that the winners will receive significant funding, mentorship, and guidance to take their beauty business to the next level!!

Congratulations to all the winners! @skininspired.in @notjustvanilla.co @amrightindia @journeyofobjects

Proud to have been on the jury for the third year for the BEAUTY&YOU India program. Created by The Estée Lauder Companies’ New Incubation Ventures with lead partner NYKAA, the program offers a unique opportunity for aspiring beauty entrepreneurs to bring their ideas to life via a cash grant along with mentorship, resources and national and international exposure. Congratulations to all the winners! @skininspired.in @notjustvanilla.co @amrightindia @journeyofobjects
